Headline: O'Hare-Bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Logan Sqaure
ShortDescription: O'Hare Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare Blue Line trains are standing at Logan Square due to a door problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
